hero.headline: We structure evidence for better decisions.
hero.subheadline: We design systems that transform fragmented information — documents, data, interviews, and archives — into organized, comparable, and traceable knowledge that supports responsible decision-making.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.body: We are a consultancy focused on structuring evidence in complex environments.
whoWeAre.bodyExtended: We combine expertise in information systems, data science, and institutional analysis to transform fragmented information into clear, verifiable tools. Our focus is not technology for its own sake, but the quality, traceability, and usefulness of evidence.
whoWeAre.mission: To design rigorous systems that organize and connect evidence, enabling better-informed decisions.
whoWeAre.closing: We operate under a clear principle: structure evidence without advocacy. Our systems prioritize traceability, context, and clarity. When information is incomplete or limited, it is explicitly indicated.

team.name: [Founder Name]
team.bio: Economist with experience in governance, indicators, and historical evidence. Four years at the World Justice Project. Previous work at Colombia's Truth Commission on evidence collection and organization. Focus on institutional problem interpretation, evidence criteria, and neutrality.
